meanings.definition: Make a formal application or request.
meanings.sent1: I will apply for the job by submitting my resume.
meanings.sent2: She decided to apply for a scholarship to help pay for college.
meanings.sent3: I will apply for a refund on this broken toy.
meanings.sent4: He applied for a promotion, hoping to climb the career ladder.
meanings.sent5: She applied for a loan to buy a new car.

meanings.sent1: Please apply the brakes to stop the car.
meanings.sent2: He will apply his knowledge of coding to develop a new app.
meanings.sent3: I will apply my cooking skills to make a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: She applied her creativity to design a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent5: They applied their teamwork to complete the project on time.

meanings.definition: Put or spread (a substance) on a surface.
meanings.sent1: You can apply sunscreen to protect your skin from the sun.
meanings.sent2: She will apply paint to the walls to give them a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally applied too much glue to the paper.
meanings.sent4: He applied a thin layer of oil to the pan before cooking.
meanings.sent5: They applied a coat of varnish to the wooden table for a glossy finish.
